title: Immune Booster Injection | East Valley Naturopathic Doctors
description: Our immune booster injection can not only prepare you for flu season, it can keep you healthy year round and help your body heal faster... Learn More
cleaned_text: Vitamin B12, B complex, Zinc, Engystol - $40 [The Immune Booster is a combination of ingredients that enhance the immune system. The main ingredient, Engystol, is a vial of a combination homeopathic remedy that is designed to activate our immune cells and is best known for cases of the flu and other viral diseases. Vitamin B12 and the B-Complex (Vitamin B1, B2, B3, B5, and B6) provide additional support. Zinc is included for its immune boosting properties and its influences on collagen production. Zinc is ideal for wound healing making this injection a favorable adjunctive therapy to be used after any surgical procedure. The main intention of the Immune Booster is to be used as a monthly preventative or immediately upon an acute illness or
